text: Reni () is a city in Izmail Raion, Odesa Oblast, Ukraine. Reni is on the left bank of the river Danube. In 2022, 17,736 people lived there. Until 18 July 2020, Reni was the administrative centre of Reni Raion. On the night of 24 July 2023, the port of Reni was attacked by Russian drones. == Other websites == * Category:Cities in Odesa Oblast
title: Reni, Ukraine
